forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city is softly wrapped in a blanket of clouds, cradling the low temperature around fifty-seven degrees. The air carries a brisk energy, with the west-southwest winds whispering through the streets at fifteen miles per hour, occasionally gusting up to eighteen. As the day unfolds, the promise of sunshine emerges, hinting at a warm, amicable afternoon that may see temperatures hover near seventy but dip slightly as the day wanes.

The marine layer appears to linger, particularly along the coastal stretch towards the Golden Gate, veiling the iconic bridge in a gentle mist, providing an ethereal touch to the morning light. Clarity is on the horizon but may take its time revealing the city's beloved landmarks. Layering becomes essential; a light jacket paired with a breathable shirt will offer comfort against the cool breeze, while also preparing you for the day’s gradual warming trend. A stroll through the Presidio, perhaps with a warm cup from a local café, seems perfectly suited for today’s whims—allowing one to bask in the emerging sunlight while absorbing the soothing sights and sounds of the awake city around you.
